beer.beer_description:
We’re putting the beer back together. 
We’re on a mission from God. 

Brewed by our Italian ‘brothers’ Alessio aka Jake, and Lorenzo aka Elwood, this Hazy IPA exhibits zesty citrus and stonefruit flavours from NZ hops Riwaka, Motueka and Southern Cross. The perfect accompaniment to toasted white bread, 
or four whole fried chickens, this brew is best enjoyed whilst listening to both types of music, country AND western! 

And remember, people, that no matter who you are and what you do to live, thrive and survive, there’re still some things that make us all the same. You. Me. Them. Everybody. Everybody.

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 225 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 46!

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 215 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 44! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_name: Super Style: IPA - New England / Hazy (Level 21)
items.badge_description: The haze craze is here for days. The third in our series of “Super Style” badges, this one celebrates New England-style / hazy IPAs, which ranked as the 2nd most checked-in style of 2021. AVAILABLE ONLY TO UNTAPPD INSIDERS.

Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 30 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 7.

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 170 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 35!

items.checkin_comment: Best one i had. Great taste, was a real explosion of taste in the mouth!
